groupdesc: Here you may configure advanced theme settings associated with the additional metatags, CSS files and output.

fields.name: widget_rules_state
fields.label: Widget rules
fields.tooltip: Enable widget rules used to disable specific widgets on selected pages or for specific groups of users.

fields.name: use_page_preloader
fields.label: Use page preloader
fields.tooltip: Enable use of page preloader vivible before full page is loaded.

fields.name: ga_ua_id
fields.label: Google Analytics tracking ID
fields.tooltip: Please specify the UA ID i.e. UA-XXXXXX-Y

fields.name: prefixfree_state
fields.label: Use Prefixfree script
fields.tooltip: Enable use of the Prefixfree script which cause that the CSS vendor prefixes are unnecessary.

fields.name: emoticons_widget_state
fields.label: Parse emoticons within text widgets
fields.tooltip: Enable parsing of emoticons within widget text.

fields.name: shortcodes_widget_state
fields.label: Parse shortcodes within text widgets
fields.tooltip: Enable parsing of shortcodes within widget text.

fields.name: thickbox_state
fields.label: Use Thickbox
fields.tooltip: Enable use of Thickbox to display post images in the popup.

fields.name: content_width_variable
fields.label: Value of variable $content_width
fields.tooltip: Specify the value of the $content_width variable to avoid problems with images, oEmbeds etc. We recommend setting this to the theme's maximum width.

fields.name: overridecss_state
fields.label: Use the override.css file
fields.tooltip: Enable inclusion of the override.css file in the <head> section. The override.css file is the best way to add modifications and new CSS code without changing the original theme files.

fields.name: custom_rss_feed
fields.label: Custom RSS feed URL
fields.tooltip: Specify the custom RSS feed URL if you're using services like Feedburner

fields.name: cache_manifest
fields.label: Cache manifest filename
fields.tooltip: Please specify the cache manifest filename if you need. This file should be located in the root of your WordPress installation.

fields.name: comments_autoblank
fields.label: Add target blank to comments links
fields.tooltip: If this option is enabled then every link in the comments text will contain attribute target='_blank'.

fields.name: comments_autolinking
fields.label: Autolinking in comments
fields.tooltip: If this option is enabled then every link in the comments text will be automatically changed into hyperlink.

fields.name: opensearch_explained
fields.label: Open Search is an open protocol used to easily integrate your page search with the browser search engines.

fields.name: opensearch_use_opensearch
fields.label: Enable support for Open Search
fields.tooltip: Enable support for Open Search, which activates an implementation of custom search engines based upon your blog search engines.

fields.name: opengraph_explained
fields.label: Open Graph is an open protocol used for better control over content displayed in Facebook.

fields.name: opengraph_use_opengraph
fields.label: Enable support for Open Graph
fields.tooltip: Enable support for Open Graph, exposing additional options to make your content more readable to Facebook crawlers.
